import axios from"axios";export default{// Gets all posts
getFavBooks:function getFavBooks(){return axios.get("/api/posts");},// Gets the post with the given id
getPost:function getPost(id){return axios.get("/api/posts/"+id);},// Deletes the post with the given id
deletePost:function deletePost(id){return axios.delete("/api/posts/"+id);},// Saves a post to the database
saveBook:function saveBook(postData){return axios.post("/api/posts",postData);},getBook:function getBook(book){return axios.get("https://www.googleapis.com/books/v1/volumes?q=".concat(book,"&key=AIzaSyCIglnekiUoDx7Q2-RDWK-O0Il2B2ehAQY"));}};
